channel.title: Add to Discord on barroomhero
channel.description: Recent content in Add to Discord on barroomhero

item.title: Games
item.description: Mushroom Cloud (Free) Actual Game: Deck of cards is fanned out around a full unopened beer can. Players take turns selecting cards, guessing the color, and placing the cards on the top of the beer can. If the player guesses the color correctly, then they give a sip, else, they take a sip. The cards must be placed such that at least 1/3 of the card overhangs the previously placed card(s), effectively creating a mushroom cloud.

item.title: Commands
item.description: $menu Opens main menu from which all games can be executed. $prefix Allows user to change prefix used by bot - default is $. $mushroom Play Mushroom Cloud (skip menu). $red Guess “red” as the color of the drawn card. $black Guess “black” as the color of the drawn card. $horse Play Horse Races.
